questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a hook-up diagram?

answers.a: To show the electrical connections of instruments
answers.b: To illustrate the process flow of a plant
answers.c: To provide detailed information about instrument installation and connection
answers.d: To specify the material of construction for instruments

questions.question: Which of the following symbols is used to represent a temperature transmitter in a hook-up diagram?
What is the typical notation used to identify a field instrument in a hook-up diagram?
A hook-up diagram for a pressure gauge would typically include which of the following?
Which of the following is NOT typically included in a hook-up diagram?
What is the purpose of a junction box in a hook-up diagram?

answers.a: To connect multiple instruments to a single power source
answers.b: To provide a convenient location for instrument maintenance
answers.c: To protect instruments from environmental factors
answers.d: To connect instruments to a control system

questions.question: A hook-up diagram for a flow meter would typically include which of the following?

answers.a: Use different line styles to distinguish between different types of connections
